name: Kaumudi Enterprises
description: manufacturer, supplier and trader of int
overview:
Year of Establishment 2001, We “Kaumudi Enterprises” are one of the manufacturer, supplier, Exporter and trader of international quality range of Home Decorative Product, Stainless Steel Utensil, Brass Statue.

Products: Stainless Steel Utensil, Brass Statue, Plastic Products, Glass Lantern, Candle Stand, Crystal Stone Lamp & Flower Pot & Candle Stand.

Quality Assurance: As a quality conscious company, we are committed to offer our clients, products that meet highest standards of quality. We are open to the changing demands of our customers and permanently in pursuit of excellence. We have an in-house research and development unit which continuously monitors upgradation of our existing products and also development of new-products.

Our Team: Our company’s core strength is our team of committed, skilled and dedicated professionals known for their focused approach to their duties and responsibilities.

Client Satisfaction: Growing consistently with zeal and hard work, we make sure that all our clients are completely satisfied in terms of quality of the products delivered to them. We practice a stringent quality control measures in the manufacturing of all our products and ensure that each process is strictly monitored under the experts.

Why Us: Since its inception our company’s endeavor has always been to do their best in catering the needs of their valued customers with their high quality products and services, of course at reasonable rates. Our clients prefer doing business with because of our: Superior range of products Modern facilities for manufacturing
